page.title: 15CHILDREN'S INTERESTS 1985
page.content: { TELEVISION PROGRAMMES.} In our classroom there are 21 pupils.We all like watching television.The favourite type of programme is action and adventure which covers programmes like"Cover up" and"The A team."Only 3 people in the class like watching the news. {COMICS/MAGAZINES. 16 people in our class buy comics,2 people buy magazines.8 people buy comics and magazines with fun and story.1 person buys story comics.10 people buy comics with just fun. {FAVOURITE BOOKS.} There are 21 pupils in our classroom.15 of them like reading books.14 people often read books.The favourite author is Enid Blyton,8 people like her.The favourite type of book is adventure,a few people like the Famous Five.{
